Vendors - Account Balances

Once vendors are created or imported into the database, the amounts outstanding to them can either be imported into the database or specified manually for each vendor.

Click here to import open documents
Click this option to import the vendor account balances. Ensure that the file containing the account balance details meets the requirements specified. The Source File Selection section of the Data Import Wizard is displayed.
Data Import
You can also access the import option by selecting Utility > Import > Data.
Click here to enter document details for each vendor
Use this option to enter the vendor balances manually for each vendor. You will see the Vendor Balances dialog box.
  • Click Next. You will see the Security section.
See also
Vendor Information
